pull.title: Include cstring alongside select in compat/glib_sanity.cpp
pull.body:
At least SmartOS implements FD_ZERO relative to memset but does not
ensure its availability. Including cstring fixes that.

events.body: Should fix #13581. @stacepellegrino are you up for building this branch?

events.message:
Include cstring alongside select in compat/glib_sanity.cpp

At least SmartOS implements FD_ZERO relative to memset but does not
ensure its availability. Including cstring fixes that.

rename.from: Inlcude cstring rather than cstddef in compat/glib_sanity.cpp
rename.to: Include cstring alongside select in compat/glib_sanity.cpp

events.body:
Alternatively we could include cstring all the time and drop the extern definition for memcpy.
/cc @theuni 679240d0e9
Closing this since I'm doubting #13581 now.
Yes, this is not correct. We're attempting to replace memcpy, so including cstring is not the right thing to do. I'll comment further on #13581.
